page.title: 01Information Page
page.content: Most of the area is{farmland.}There is a small amount of{light industry}and{ {two housing estates. Most of the{farmland}is used for rough grazing.There is a small amount of arable land. The{light industry}is mainly on the Maesglas Industrial Estate, although most of this estate is outside of our area.The Inmos microchip factory is a new development in this area.{Newport {Docks}covers an area of 125 acres on the western side of the area. There are two{housing estates,}one at Maesglas and the larger one at Duffryn which received a national award for its design when it opened in the late 1970's.
